Package org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.xml

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IItemTypeHandler
    Handler for different types of item declaration inside the xml recipe file.
    IRecipeConditionHandler
    Handler to check a type of recipe condition.
    IRecipeTypeHandler<I extends IRecipeInput,O extends IRecipeOutput,P extends IRecipeProperties>
    Handler for a specific type of recipe.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommonRecipeTypeHandler<I extends IRecipeInput,O extends IRecipeOutput,P extends IRecipeProperties>
    A default implementation of IRecipeTypeHandler with some helper methods and IItemTypeHandler's.
    ConfigRecipeConditionHandler
    Condition handler for checking if configs are enabled.
    DefaultItemTypeHandler
    Default item type handler for text nodes of the form evilcraft:darkGem"
    DefaultItemTypeHandler.IngredientNBT  
    FluidConditionHandler
    Condition handler for checking if a fluid has been registered.
    GridRecipeTypeHandler
    Common handler for both shaped and shapeless recipes.
    ItemConditionHandler
    Condition handler for checking if an item has been registered.
    ModRecipeConditionHandler
    Condition handler for checking if mods are available.
    OreDictConditionHandler
    Condition handler for checking if an oredict key is present.
    OreDictItemTypeHandler
    Item type handler for ore dictionary keys.
    PredefinedItemTypeHandler
    Item type handler for ore dictionary keys.
    PredefinedRecipeConditionHandler
    Condition handler for checking if configs are enabled.
    ShapedRecipeTypeHandler
    Handler for shaped recipes.
    ShapelessRecipeTypeHandler
    Handler for shapeless recipes.
    SmeltingRecipeTypeHandler
    Recipe type handler for smelting recipes.
    SuperRecipeTypeHandler<I extends IRecipeInput,O extends IRecipeOutput,P extends IRecipeProperties>
    Recipe type handler for super recipes.
    XmlRecipeLoader
    An XML Recipe loader.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    XmlRecipeLoader.XmlRecipeException
    Error that can occur while reading xml recipes.
